黱字的基本解释

黱
dài
古同“黛”。

黱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dài］
［《廣韻》徒耐切，去代，定。］
亦作“黱1”。
(1)青黑色的颜料。古时女子用以画眉。
(2)青黑色。
(3)妇女眉毛的代称。

黱字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【黑字部】　黱； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1521第37
【唐韻】徒耐切【集韻】待戴切，?音代。【說文】畫眉也。今省作黛。【玉篇】深靑也。【杜甫·古栢行】黱色參天二千尺。　又【集韻】直稔切，音朕。黑色。

黱字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
黱字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Yin
dài
Gu Tong "Dai".
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dài］
["Guangyun" is only patiently cut, go to generation, set. ]
Also known as "Yi 1".
(1) Cyan black pigment. In ancient times, women used to thrush.
(2) Cyan and black.
(3) The pronoun for women's eyebrows.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haijixia】【Black Word Department】　黱; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1521 Page 37
[Tang Yun] Tu Naiqie [Ji Yun] Waiting for Daiqie,? Sound generation. [Said the text] Thrush also. This province is a Dai Dai. [Jade articles] Deep and deep. 【Du Fu·Gu Baixing】The towering color is two thousand feet.　[Jiyun] Straight Minor cut, Yin Zhen. black.
